original_title: President reveals plans to establish Agro – Technology University in Sri Lanka.
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe outlined a comprehensive plan to revitalize Sri Lanka’s agricultural export sector in his speech at the 25th Presidential Awards of the Export Development Board (EDB), held at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) today (23)

The President also underscored the importance of modernizing agricultural practices and enhancing research capabilities. He revealed plans to restructure and modernize existing agricultural research institutes, culminating in the establishment of the Agro-Technology University of Sri Lanka.
